text:
Data Minded Solutions | Greater New York City | UI, Full Stack Engineer | ONSITE

 We are an early stage startup with the goal to help patients leverage technology to better manage their conditions, provide clinical insights and coordination, and help research institutes advance patient care methods. Today our platform leverages the evolving digital health ecosystem to capture patient data, and provides analytics on the data to improve coordination at the point of care.

Apply through the website or contact me directly at nishant@datamindedsolutions.com, I’d love to tell you more!

Our Stack: JavaScript, Node, React, DynamoDB, S3, EC2, Docker  

Full Stack Engineer: http://www.datamindedsolutions.com/full-stack-engineer-2

UI Engineer: http://www.datamindedsolutions.com/ui-engineer
